metadata.title: USN-3454-1 -- libffi vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libffi incorrectly enforced an executable stack. An attacker could possibly use this issue, in combination with another vulnerability, to facilitate executing arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3454-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libffi6-udeb - 3.1~rc1+r3.0.13-12ubuntu0.2 libffi6 - 3.1~rc1+r3.0.13-12ubuntu0.2 libffi-dev - 3.1~rc1+r3.0.13-12ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
